verse: Perfectly pointless, says the Teacher, everything is pointless.
Additionally: Because the Teacher was wise, he constantly taught the people knowledge. He listened and investigated. He composed many proverbs.
The Teacher searched for pleasing words, and he wrote truthful words honestly.
So this is the end of the matter; all has been heard. Worship God and keep Godâ€™s commandments because this is what everyone must do.
God will definitely bring every deed to judgment, including every hidden thing, whether good or bad.
